The Detroit Pistons secured a thrilling victory against the Atlanta Hawks with a last-minute buzzer-beater.
Troy Weaver, the GM of the Pistons, has called this win a crucial milestone in the team's rebuilding process.
Trae Young had a stellar performance, scoring 30 points despite the Hawks' loss.
Many fans argue this game might mark a turning point for the Pistons this season.
The early-season matchup drew significant attention with both teams showcasing rising talent.
Detroit's new rookie, known for his impressive college career, played exceptionally well.
Spectators claim the Pistons' defense could have been tighter, but they managed to hold their lead.
